name: Un:logical
description:
Participation in the VR game "Un:logical" is by invitation only.

You are welcomed to this virtual world, where one's senses of touch, taste, and pain are real, by the adorable "Apprentice Angel".

Those who participate will later find themselves threatened by the "side effects" caused by the game...

name: Fast:Run
description: Fast:Run is an exhilarating, fast-paced running game that challenges your reflexes and speed. In this game, Your goal is to navigate through these obstacles as quickly as possible without crashing.

name: Geometry Shooter Pro
description:
Geometry Shooter PRO takes the exciting foundation of the original Geometry Shooter and cranks it up to the next level! Jump into this hand-drawn arcade game where precision meets action.

Fire from a moving cannon at expanding geometric shapes like circles, squares, and triangles, all while mastering the art of perfect shots and crazy combos.

In this enhanced version, experience brand-new PVP and CO-OP modes, where you can team up or compete with friends for the ultimate score.

No more game-overs after a single mistake! Now you have 3 lives to keep the fun going! Plus, discover bonus balls with unique effects that add new layers of strategy..

Whether you're a fan of the original or a new player, Geometry Shooter PRO promises even more challenging and exciting gameplay. Can you master the art of the perfect shot?

name: Long Drive North
description: Explore and survive the harsh American wilderness in the Long Drive North. Drive and repair your trusty old RV, scavenge for parts, hunt and cook to survive; all alone or with up to 4 players in co-op. No zombies or monsters await – just an immersive driving-exploration-survival experience.

name: Goober Arena
description: *Goober Arena* is a fast-paced PvP battleground where squishy combatants slam, bounce, and trap each other in chaotic, goo-filled arenas. Customize your Goober, master tricky traps, and outwit opponents in online multiplayer madness!

name: Pixicharm Collection 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Taxi Xtreme Urban Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Tomba! 2
description: An upcoming remastered version of Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return for modern consoles.

name: Fear Effect
description: An upcoming remaster of the original Fear Effect for modern consoles.

name: MegaMan Super Charged
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Dynamo
description: An adventure-style Sonic fangame, focused on exploration.

name: Rockman & Forte FC
description: A demake of Mega Man & Bass in 8-bit style.

name: Yoobot Vs. Yoonot
description: A flash game created by the British Heart Foundation in the late 2000s to help educate youth on how to have healthy habits.

name: Power Drill Massacre
description: Power Drill Massacre Arcade is a short adventure horror game developed by Puppet Combo. It is an 8-bit arcade version of Power Drill Massacre.

name: Doors More Doors
description: Doors Moor Doors is a puzzle-adventure game set in a mysterious underground facility filled with countless doors. Your mission is simple: escape. But finding your way out won't be easy. You'll need to search for items, solve puzzles, and make your way through complex environments, each with its own set of challenges. The game offers a variety of doors to unlock, each leading to new surprises or obstacles.

name: Moonlight Frog Inn
description: Moonlight Frog Inn is a simulation game where Titi, a frog who dreams of reaching the moon, runs an inn to make that dream a reality.

name: Dusttale: The Murderous Comedy
description:
A complete reimagining of dusttale. New bosses, new areas, many different endings and 3 routes.

The main difference from other dusttale takes, is that here your choices really matter, and even just killing everyone can be done in different ways. As well as giving up killing and getting a good ending. Also remember, Sans is not the main character in this comedy!

name: Mickey's Robot Laboratory
description: Mickey's Robot Laboratory is a flash game where you can assemble a robot, using the ready-made pieces that you will be offered. The goal is to defeat as many robots as possible with your creation.

name: Boobs Hidden Los Angeles
description: 100 Boobs in all shapes and sizes are waiting for you to be found on the sun-kissed shores of Venice Beach in Los Angeles!

name: The Death Night Show
description: You are a sinner. Do you know what happens to sinners when they go to Hell? They appear on Hell's best (and only) late-night television program; THE DEATH NIGHT SHOW! If Death considers you entertaining, he might let you escape a gruesome afterlife punishment. After all, boredom is the biggest sin in Hell! What will your afterlife look like?

name: Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge
description: Unlike traditional hidden object games, "Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge" offers you an entirely new treasure-hunting experience! Each mission item is cleverly split into two parts, scattered throughout the picture.

name: Balanced
description: A cozy deckbuilder about balancing the forces of nature: sit back, relax, and enjoy this zen game of life and harmony. How long can you keep the scale Balanced?

name: Stunt Dog Adventure
description: The "Stunt Dog Adventure" is a thrilling retro inspired 2D side scrolling action game. Collect bones, solve puzzles, swim and fly to rescue a team of kidnapped All-Star Stunt Dogs!

name: Waznk Zahb
description: The game is based on the hit Arab TV quiz show waznk zahb ( Your weight in gold ) . You have to answer a series of questions on a variety of topics like history , sports , science and if you manage to answer everything correctly you will win the prize ( Your weight in gold ) .

name: Obama in the Dark
description: Help president Obama solve the mystery of a creepy haunted house!

name: Whites This
description: A 4D maze game, that can help exercise those 4D brain cells.

name: Transformers: Multi Shock
description: Sin descripción

name: Robo Dome
description: Compete in the famed Robo Dome championship as Rei Castor. Test your ability in this roguelite shoot em’ up against a barrage of enemies and projectiles. Face off against giant robots and other contestants in an attempt to come on top of this year’s Robo Dome championship in Valhalla City.

name: Succubers! Dark Covenant
description: Succubers! Dark Covenant is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find nurses, nuns, housewives, and more! Explore the maps with your favorite characters and achieve your ultimate dreams!

name: Yokai Busters
description: Yokai Busters is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find a police officer, a caring mom, a shrine maiden, and more! Explore the maps and have a blast battling with your favorite Japanese girls, and Yokai!

name: Worker 42
description: Worker 42 is a single-player first-person exploration game. Use your scanner to find your way in the interstellar darkness of space. Repair the various systems of the station, complete your tasks and return to Earth. But something seems wrong on this planet.

name: Steinkraft
description: Minecraft inspired game by André Schnabel

name: CommanderTux
description: Short platformer game by André Schnabel

name: SpaceSoldier3D
description: Wolfenstein inspired game by André Schnabel

name: Shine On, My Little Sun
description: When the Sun fell, darkness covered the world. In the snowy wasteland, the town of Svargo thrived under its faint light. But the Sun did not go out. The small Sun sleeps atop a grim lighthouse. What happens when the Sun awakens, seeking a few days of simple childhood?

name: Bad Cheese
description: Bad Cheese is a psychological horror inspired by the eerie charm of 1920s animation. Step into the tiny paws of a mouse spending the weekend at home with a dysfunctional Dad while Mom's away. Be on your best behavior and KEEP DADDY HAPPY.

name: Spider
description: Sin descripción

name: Dunebound Tactics
description: Lead your band of survivors on a perilous trek across unforgiving sands in search of a new home. Battle ruthless factions, scavenge dwindling resources, reshape the terrain to your advantage and make life-or-death choices in Dunebound Tactics, a Roguelite Turn-Based Tactical RPG.

name: The Lost
description: The Lost was an action adventure/survival horror game co-developed by Irrational Games (the makers of Bioshock) and FXLabs. Set to be released in 2002 for the Playstation 2 and Xbox game consoles, The Lost went through several phases of development hell until it was cancelled. FXLabs bought everything related to The Lost in 2008 and finished the game, releasing it as AGNI on PC.

name: Campervan Simulator
description: Earn money, buy and build your dream caravan from the junkyard, travel in the open world, light a fire and enjoy! 400 - 600 km² Huge Open World

name: RailGods of Hysterra
description: Embark on a co-op survival journey for 1-5 players through a post-apocalyptic Lovecraftian world! Command and evolve a living, monstrous train, craft weapons, build a mobile base, gain powers, and face the Great Old Ones. Explore an ever-changing world, hold on to your sanity, and ascend to godhood!

name: The Last Knife
description: Sin descripción

name: Bangkok Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Pakapow Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Creatzor: Isekai Dino Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Bitkub Metaverse
description: Sin descripción

name: The Devil's Bride
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal League
description: Sin descripción

name: Warden's Ascent
description: Sin descripción

name: Kooeh
description: Kooeh: A Timeless Delight is a cosy single-player narrative driven heartwarming restaurant management game about recollecting lost family recipes and reviving the family restaurant.

name: White Heaven
description: Canceled sequel to the 2012 Adventure-Horror game 'Anna.' White Heaven was to take place in an abandoned hotel nestled in the Italian Alps, eponymously titled White Heaven. Its narrative focuses on a kidnapped victim escaping his captivity after having fallen in love with one of his captors. The game was to follow three playable characters while continuing to explore the backstory of its predecessor rather than serving as a direct continuation. Early footage showcased chase sequences, which weren't attempted in the developer's previous work. The game was announced in 2013 and was being created in Unreal Engine 4 with an additional extension to aid with dynamic lighting. In 2020, its developers announced a cancelation of this iteration of the game, as they felt it to be "too much, too soon" in terms of the story they were attempting to tell.

name: Carrying Carrots
description: Help a cute bunny delivering carrots to his lovely wife on his journey across the floating lands of Unblemished. Brave dozens of hand-crafted challenges, carry delicious carrots, and be the household provider.

name: Ayon: Split In Time
description: AYON: Split in Time is an Action Adventure RPG game where players use ancient artifacts to time-travel, solve puzzles, and battle enemies across diverse eras to reunite with their brother.

name: Faraway: On Lost Isles
description: Explore randomly generated islands, gather resources, build homes, and farm. Survive by managing health, comfort, and hunger. Brave the night to fend off enemies and progress to new islands to unlock advanced crafting. Enjoy a rich build system allowing vast creativity.

name: Flightless Star
description: Lost in space, a little bird must jump into the void and overcome its dangers to return home, in this challenging 2D puzzle "platformer" style game. Launch yourself from one planet to the other while dealing with their treacherous gravity fields and avoiding the dangers in your way.

name: Last Story: Dungeon
description: Explore a mysterious dungeon in this 2D platformer, uncovering the secrets of Drystan and his missing parents. With stunning visuals and an engaging soundtrack, get ready for a challenging and mystery-filled experience.

name: Perk Park Paradise
description: As aspiring baristas, unravel the shop's secrets through immersive puzzles and interactive props. Navigate and master coffee-themed challenges in stunning environments. Are you ready to brew up excitement and unlock the secrets of Brew Haven?

name: Serial Victims
description: Serial Victims is a 3D psychological horror game that immerses you in the nightmares of individuals who fell prey to serial killers. In Serial Victims, you embody each victim, racing against time to uncover clues, call for help, and do what you can before the inevitable happens.

name: Nova Era: Atom
description: Welcome to the first trailer of Nova Era: Atom, Welcome to Nova Era: Atom, a sci-fi MMORPG game blending Chinese mythology. where you can DIY your own custom spaceship and explore the endless mysteries of the cosmos.

name: ExoHarvest
description: ExoHarvest game pioneers land on Earth Experience a unique survival experience, explore the land, farm, find resources. Trade with partners Fight against unknown creatures.

name: The Clean Knife
description: Claude, a high school student, pays a visit to his classmate Emma. He stumbles upon a strange knife in the attic, and both are thrown into an otherworldly realm, haunted by ghosts. Now they must find a way to restore the house to its original form, and seal back the rampaging ghosts.

name: Bullet Brain
description: Bullet brain is a top-down shooter where you jump between enemies in short, handcrafted levels. Bounce around in cueballs, eject old bodies out of windows, and ride grenades back to whoever shot them. Make things worse. Flood the pump. Spread the rot.

name: Piggly Pagly Boom
description: Can you master this red-hot fireball platform shooting game? Save the world or get turned into roasted ham!

name: Extinction
description: On the brink of Extinction, fight for your survival and explore the vast galaxies at your disposal.

name: StarKeeper
description: StarKeeper is a management sim where you run a bar on an asteroid hurtling through the endless cosmos. Unlock new furniture and resources to accommodate your culturally and species-diverse guests. Established relationships will help you survive threats and affect the shape of star systems.

name: Dice of Arcana
description: Dice of Arcana is a wicked roguelite dice game. Survive a blood-drenched trip on a caravan led by a malevolent puppet. Bet your fingers, break the rules with special dice, face major arcana and prevail: losing means death.

name: Retroronto
description: Retroronto is an arcade-style city-life simulator, where you explore a thriving metropolis, engage in minigames to earn money, and meet people to unlock newer locations and jobs! Manage your finances, energy, and time in this contemporary life simulator in the big city!

name: Gold Lining
description: Gold Lining is a narrative platformer about a teenage girl who must find her way back home from a beautiful, fantastical realm. There, she relives her memories, revealing a touching story about understanding her mother and finding meaning in life’s imperfections.

name: Key Fairy
description: A hand-drawn, pacifist, folkloric, bullet-hell. Grapple and dance around monsters to collect their shattered stars, weave your way through twisting paths, encounter strange folk, uncover ancient magic, and evade forgotten gods in this frenetic 2D action-adventure.

name: The Father's Story
description: Set in the first century, The Father's Story is a visual novel which offers a different perspective of the Christmas Story and the events surrounding that night.

name: Portal Protectors
description: Take the journey of the Portal Protector as you defend the portals to the divine realm from evil. Use strategy and skill to aid you in your defense against evil using magic, sword skills, and defensive towers. For you are the Portal Protector!

name: Good Boy
description: An ecosystem driven metroidvania on the mysterious planet of Terra II! Take control of Good Boy and explore the strange new world! Complete quests for other good boys and girls, capture and research exotic alien life, and forge a relationship with your new human friend!

name: Rules of War
description: A simple 4X Turn-based military strategy game with missile warfare. Command troops, expand your borders, and launch missiles against your enemies. Balance expansion, technology, and diplomacy. Can you lead your nation to victory?

name: BeeFriend
description: BeeFriend is a cozy simulation game where you tend to honey bees and expand your apiary. Build hives, gather honey, and create a thriving bee haven. Turn your beekeeping hobby into a famous enterprise. Enjoy nurturing your colonies, observing bees, and the peaceful life of a beekeeper.

name: Carsh
description: Carsh is a battle royale game where you drive a car and play a puzzle game at the same time. Enjoy the most heated battles you have ever experienced.

name: Lunar // Drill
description: LUNAR//DRILL is a Couch-Coop Bossfight for two players! Play Luna & Drillian, two aliens with unique spaceships and abilities. Work together to defeat the Mecha-Spider attacking your moon!

name: Welcome to Ela
description: Welcome to Ela is an active-time battle RPG in which you explore the wicked city of Ela, a place filled with the horrors of the common life. Prepare yourself to face the threats awaiting in your journey, gather resources, unlock new abilities and escape this hopeless place before it's too late.

name: The Core
description: A game in the TPS / Topdown Shooter genre. eliminate enemies with various abilities such as slowing down time, protect the core until it activates again, defeat the boss. You can try again and again with various difficulty.

name: Mindbreak Mansion
description: Enter the enigmatic world of Mindbreak Mansion, where puzzles and mysteries await around every corner. Solve intricate challenges, unlock hidden secrets, and unravel the mysteries of this captivating adventure. Will you escape the mansion's grasp, or succumb to its mind-bending allure?

name: Pawelek the Game.
description: Pawełek The Game is a game full of challenges, jokes and twists. Take on the role of a pawelek, craft items, fight and earn new Loot and uncover the truth about your love

name: Popit Sanic Goo!
description: An awesome and colorful Match 3 adventure with lot of characters and powerups, make them pop and unlock new areas and levels, some are relaxing and others are challenging. Ame roes, taels, big da cat , shedew and more are here!

name: The Wanderer
description: "There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy."

name: Festival Fever
description: Festival Fever is a music festival management sim which sees the player take control and tasks them to build and manage the best festival in the world!

name: Castle Rain
description: Castle Rain is a 3D top-down action game where you control Billy, a mushroom whose island was devastated by a villain who turned his friends and everyone around into manipulated zombies.

name: GladMort
description: In a faraway kingdom in a land of legend, a mysterious plague of unknown origin has rapidly infected the population. Dubbed the "Red Plague", the evil nature of the phenomenon is unmistakable: the dead begin to rise from their graves, and demonic incarnations begin to appear.

name: Em.Path
description: Immersive witch and camping simulator set in a surreal world glitched beyond salvation. Travel and maintain your RV, pickup strange hitchhikers, study the occult and rewrite the laws of nature

name: Cute Bless
description: Cute Bless is a game where cuteness is deceptive. Defeat various bosses to try to fill your emptiness. Or simply wander through the cities trying to find an explanation for the cuteness around you.

name: VisualHacker2D
description: Set in a world of Magic, Hacking and Augmentations, rescue your newborn baby from the evil clutches of the Hospital Corporation. "If you can't pay your bill, we will auction her off like property". Will you pay or will you fight your way up the 4 floors of the hospital and fight to save your baby?

name: The Witch of the Wake
description: The Witch of the Wake is a seafaring supernatural horror/thriller visual novel inspired by media such as The Thing, The Terror, and Return of the Obra Dinn.

name: Half-Life: History of Kumertau
description: Half-Life: History of Kumertau is a work-in-progress singleplayer first-person shooter video game, based on a custom Half-Life 1 SDK known as PrimeXT SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.

name: Gran Saga Idle: Knights x Knights
description:
Adventure in the Esprogen continent, the Great Continent, and the Gerus Empire,
Build relationships with veteran warriors and make them your friends!
By exchanging, combining and developing skills,
Build your own powerful knight group!

name: Es
description: Es is an action game developed by 9thNight (Arthearts). The game was cancelled in 2007, having released only a Beta of the first two levels.

name: Lab 77
description: The game you will love to make your friends play. In Lab 77 you play as Specimen S539-77, making your way through the challenges of Lab 77's test chambers under the supervision of the Director. Place versions of yourself to bridge gaps, collect lab notes, avoid dangers and complete your training.

name: Dawn
description: WITNESS THE DAWN! A new horror stirs in The American West. It isn’t an ordinary night. The storm outside was just the start. The wind. The rain. An omen of things to come. Attempt to escape and survive the horror as one of two characters, solo, or together with a friend.

name: Bubbits
description: Bubbits is a next generation Bubble Shooter. Compete in a 25 Player Online Battle Royale, Play VS with friends or CPU or go Solo. Customize your Playfield, unleash Power Ups and experience crazy battle events!

name: Marvel Mystic Mayhem
description: Join forces with iconic Super Heroes as they clash with the sinister forces of Nightmare, the malevolent lord of the Dream Dimension, as he seeks to dominate the waking world. Get a glimpse into the deepest fears of Super Heroes such as Scarlet Witch, Moon Knight, and Captain America as Nightmare transforms their dreams into dangerous dungeons. Drawing energy from the Mindscape, Doctor Strange and Sleepwalker must arm their allies with dream energy to form a three-hero battle team delving into the heart of each harrowing nightmare to avert the collapse of reality.

name: SWAT Commander
description: In SWAT Commander you take charge of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your squad, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your objectives successfully. Follow your operatives into a number of high-risk missions that will test your tactical abilities.

name: Cult Of Blood
description: "Cult of Blood" is a survival horror adventure game that plunges players into a chilling, immersive experience. Set in a remote village deep within an ominous forest, the game draws inspiration from a true story, weaving a rich and terrifying narrative.

name: The Void Between
description: When one man's dream holiday turns into a nightmare, it's up to you to save him from himself... Decipher the puzzles, face the challenges and uncover the mystery to why you are here. Will you escape The Void Between?

name: PizzaBoy
description:
Take control of PizzaBoy, a nimble pizza delivery guy equipped with an air dash that allows him to bounce off walls. This can be used to reach greater heights and distances than the standard run and jump. PizzaBoy must navigate dangerous environments to deliver pizzas to hungry monsters.

Pizzaboy must make it to the end of the level to deliver the pizza but don't expect it to be too simple, as each area is full of pizza-hungry monsters. Don't get too close or they might just steal a slice! The customer won't be happy with a half-eaten pizza.

The path to the customer won't always be straightforward either. Every level is a Metroidvania-style map, with many secrets, collectibles, and areas to explore. Alongside delivering pizzas, PizzaBoy may find opportunities to recover his lost memories and discover the dark secrets of the company he works for. The player's choice in how they tackle the level will determine the ending of each chapter, and ultimately the end of the game.

If the customer is satisfied with your performance, you might just get a 5-star review.

name: The Psychologist
description: A point-and-click survival horror game, you play as a psychologist. Complete evaluations while preventing your anxiety from escalating. Can you survive The Company?

name: Quinty
description: Quinty is an unreleased puzzle game that developed by Game Freak for the Super Famicom in 1999. The game was a remake of the Famicom/NES game of the same name, which is also titled Mendel Palace outside of Japan. On October 12, 2024, 3 prototype builds of the game were leaked during the 2024 Game Freak Leak.

name: Frost Survival VR
description: Face a frozen wilderness and try to survive. Build a shelter, craft tools, hunt for food, and manage your resources to endure harsh conditions. Strategize your moves against unpredictable weather and lurking dangers. And remember to keep yourself safe and sane!

name: Lost Heaven Station
description: Lost Heaven Station is a game BASE Build-Colony-Sim for players to manage crew to survive in their train and travel to find a ‘Lost Heaven’

name: Rusty the Rooster
description: "Rusty the Rooster" is a captivating 2D pixel art platformer where players join Rusty, a brave rooster, on a heroic quest to rescue his girlfriend and unborn chicks. With its charming graphics and heartwarming storyline, this game offers an unforgettable adventure of courage and love.

name: Lost Shadows
description: A cooperative survival horror for up to 5 players. Explore procedural abandoned mines, terrifying creatures and work together to prevent a looming global catastrophe.

name: BMPES
description: BMPES is a Brazilian mod for PES 2021 that adds a bunch of content like teams, stadiums, competitions, etc. In addition to updating the player roster quite frequently.

name: Monster Lover 2: Ambrosilas
description: He's a Failure of a Yakuza. He's an Arcane Murder Genie - Can They Find Love? Our main character has been a screw-up his entire life. That's what led him to the Yakuza. He needs help, and summons Ambrosilas. But this sexy murder genie doesn't like helping criminals!

name: Pit of Gerstan
description: Pit of Gerstan is a roguelite dungeon-massacring action game. Hack, slash, throw and blast your way through hordes of enemies and bosses, as you collect various items, upgrades and weapons to create the ultimate dungeon-clearing hero.

name: Moonfrost
description: Moonfrost is an isometric, next-gen pixel art, lo-fi multiplayer life-sim set in a fantasy version of the modern day that offers a premium experience but as a free-to-play game.

name: Uncle Chuck Incorporated
description: In 2005, the robotics entertainment company Uncle Chuck Inc. mysteriously declared bankruptcy. As an investigator, your mission is to infiltrate their abandoned headquarters, solve puzzles, and find a hidden VHS tape revealing the truth, all while evading the dangerous animatronic characters.

name: Of Lies and Rain
description: Of Lies and Rain is a story-driven first person shooter built exclusively for VR. Set in a dark, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic world, at the edge of the real and digital realm. You’ll fight to reclaim your past and save humanity from the brink of extinction.

name: Second Stellar
description:
Follow Asphodene and Eridani on their star-spanning adventure to portend the mysteries of their existence. Actively wield myriad weapons and their abilities in symphony to defeat those who would bar your path. Throughout your journey, court intriguing and vibrant passengers as you venture beyond the stars above.

This adventure won't be easy- Hordes of foes will stand in your way, and you must answer their challenge to progress. Emerging triumphant against these foes will reward experience, catalyzed into unique items and upgrades to bolster your offense.

name: Out of Touch!
description:
Out of Touch is a captivating story of friendship, trauma, and healing.

At its heart is our hero CJ, who reunites with his childhood friends after years apart for their final semesters of high school.

Unbeknownst to them, ancient entities, unfathomably old and with inscrutable motives, lurk in the shadows and threaten to take control of the group and their latent powers.

name: Astrobotanica
description: Discover Earth 300 thousand years ago as an alien biologist. Utilize your expertise in botany to survive, grow plants, harvest crops, compose and brew tonics. Reveal hidden powers of unknown plants. Engage with primal humans, leaving your mark on the future of civilization.

name: Artificial Nexus
description: Susan has woken up in a strange, coffin-like device, with no memory of who or where she is. Uncover the answers as you solve puzzles to escape the building in this sci-fi mystery investigation!

name: Intergalactic Battle Roosters
description: It’s time to cluck around and find out. Gear up and pull on the helmets of the Battle Roosters, a hotshot space brigade of poultry with panache. In this quirky, roguelike, bullet hell adventure you’ll combine weapons, upgrades and killer strategies to recover space’s best taco ingredients. Bwark!

name: Path of the Oxiflame
description: Path of the Oxiflame is a 3D sokoban-puzzle-adventure inspired by classic Team Ico games. It features multiple playable characters as well as numerous puzzle mechanics beyond the classic pushing of boxes.

name: Awaken Infinity
description: A top-down RPG with visual novel elements. Wake up in a futuristic room with no memory, and unravel the mysteries of your past.

name: Wandering Monolith
description: You are the Wandering Monolith, falling from the sky. Summon towers, expand the board, defend your core, and build your deck of upgrades to conquer countless worlds.

name: Present Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Yoshi no Tamago
description: Cancelled remake of Yoshi (1991), seemingly started development some time before 1995 and undiscovered until 2024, where a DS port was discovered in the source code of Pokemon Black and White.

name: Aurora Defense
description: Construct and upgrade your base, train troops, and fend off enemy waves. Combine blessing effects to enhance forces and create tactical strategies. Each run offers fresh challenges for a unique experience.

name: Midnight Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Clockwork Rabbit
description: Tessa the bunny was hired at a textile factory as a mechanic. Create and program robots to solve logical puzzles.

name: Homunculus
description: An auto-battle game where you create and upgrade a homunculus to gather materials for the Philosopher's Stone. Explore diverse realms, use your alchemy lab to create powerful augments and complete the magnum opus.

name: Voodoo Dolls
description: Voodoo Dolls is a first person action shooter, where you need to escape the Witch's Spooky Castle. Fight through endless corridors in 90s style mazes and dungeons.

name: Urok
description: Sin descripción

name: Leap of Sins
description: Leap of Sins is a solo, first person psychological horror parkour game that thrusts you into a nightmarish version of hell. As a damned soul, you must climb a decaying skyscraper filled with deadly obstacles and deceptive jumps, all while battling the psychological horrors of your Hell Loop.

name: Haunted Mansion: Experience
description: A thrilling choice-based adventure. Drive the actions of the main character through a maze of suspense, adventure and survival decisions.

name: Destiny: Rising
description: Enter an era of heroes and legends set within the rich tapestry of the Destiny Universe, where you will meet both familiar faces and intriguing new characters. Experience top-tier sci-fi shooting action in the franchise’s first mobile game as you embark on a new adventure in an alternate Destiny timeline. Play as these unique characters to defend future Earth and reclaim humanity's future!

name: Bonanit: A Menorcan Horror Story
description: Experience sleep paralysis in Bonanit, where every game is unique and every blink counts. Face the terror lurking in the darkness of your room and find out if you can maintain your sanity until daylight arrives.

name: Office After Hours
description: Your boss has insisted on extra overtime and now you're stuck in the office after work. Keep an eye out for strange occurrences and you might find your way home.

name: Spirit X Strike
description:
An Action Adventure Game that lets you craft unique COMBOs and explore endless ways to style on your enemies with a high-speed combat system. Test your skills in fun chaotic one-vs-group battles, intense, strategic duels, and exhilarating post-apocalyptic adventure that will set your blood boiling.

Experience a fresh take on this action adventure of "Spirit X Strike," featuring three intertwined combat systems: Instant Counter, Super Strike, and Spirit Mimicry. Players can swiftly switch between defense and attack, and experience an adrenaline-pumping combat.

name: Navicula Meatus
description: A dark and surreal puzzle adventure set in a decaying town where veins pulse through ruined structures and the night hums with unfamiliar life.

name: Dicealot
description: A roguelike dice roller with deckbuilding elements

name: Solar Collision Control
description: Control the power of the sun in Solar Collision Control, a thrilling arcade game where you must survive as long as possible by avoiding obstacles, collecting stars, and completing challenging missions to achieve the highest score.

name: ExoFrontier: Venus
description: ExoFrontier: Venus is a RogueVania with RPG elements and procedurally generated levels. Follow the story of Doug who has become an Explorer and help him make Venus a better place for humans!

name: World of the dead
description: The World of the Dead is an immersive zombie FPS game that combines first-person shooter and extraction PvPvE genres. In a world of walking corpses and deformed monsters, you'll have to forge your own path to survival while keeping an eye for new firearms and equipment.

name: Leenie's Tale
description: On a quiet, moonless night, an unassuming train conductor named Ballin had no idea he was about to become entangled in an ancient, sinister mystery that haunts these lands. Will he survive this fateful night?

name: Secret Agent Wizard Boy and the International Crime Syndicate
description: Secret Agent Wizard Boy must go undercover to topple Grumblemort's evil crime syndicate, hidden beneath his wizarding school. Learn spells, engage in espionage, and spread utter lore-unfriendly chaos.

name: VTumbler
description: Dive into the vibrant world of VTubers in a free-to-play arcade puzzle fighting PVP spectacle in VTumbler!

name: The Fading of Nicole Wilson
description: Aspiring to become a famous ghost hunter, teenage girl Amy embarks on a life-changing adventure at the long-abandoned Timberline Hotel in Montana. Ghosts, however, come in several shapes, and it is the living that seem to be hiding a dark secret from her.

name: Mindflux: Dead Man Walking
description:
A third-person narrative roleplaying game set during Earth's Rusted Future in which your ability to see beyond lies, hidden agendas, and dire secrets is pivotal to solving heinous crimes.

Play as a mechanical monstrosity of a detective who augments their mind to question secretive suspects in Earth’s dystopian future. Navigate difficult narrative encounters by modifying your brain and changing your personality at will to make tactical dialogue choices.

name: Sacrilegious
description: As a powerful female warrior, travel to new sections with different maps in each section, defeat enemies, collect loot and improve your equipment. Survive in this ever-changing world using strategy and skills.

name: Oasis Blitz
description: Oasis Blitz is a third person driller! Speed through floating islands, using your drill to dive down into terrain and then burst back out. Shred down slopes on your sandboard, and grapple to enemies for extra momentum.

name: License To Clone
description: Survive a harsh desert with sci fi technology, rampant wild clones and multiple factions. Start off working in a small town for any faction, grow your money and eventually start your own town, complete bounties to earn faster cash and progress.

name: Opioid visions 88
description: Opioid visions 88 is a first person shooter. The game presents the protagonist's visions of substances that expand consciousness.

name: Savage Gears
description: Savage Gears is a violent, single-player FPS inspired by early 2000s objective-oriented action games. Armed with an Iron Fist and an arsenal of devastating weaponry, you play as Ero Lei'Bourne, a fearless soldier, on his dangerous mission to save the continent from the brink of annihilation.

name: Rogue Piñatas: VRmageddon
description: A multiplayer VR roguelite game. Your mission? Survive the party-apocalyptic world by bashing your way through swarms of invading Piñatas, where every swing could mean survival or sweet defeat!

name: Embers of Spiritflame
description: Embers of Spiritflame is an Emotional Point & Click detective adventure about the exploration of an old abandoned house. Inside, You go through comic book-inspired levels and begin to uncover why is everyone missing. View events and memories of the place and piece together the story.

name: Atha: In Search of the Well
description: Adventure of the chicken Atha and his friend Bia, facing dangers to protect their homeland, using skills such as jumping, attacking and magic, as well as solving puzzles with boxes, buttons and levers.

name: The Villain Simulator
description: A Non-VR and VR first-person adventure game that lets you experience the thrill of dominating and controlling powerful super heroines. Use a variety of machines and tools to hold them captive and experiment on them, all while guiding them towards a submissive and compliant behavior.

name: Shashlik
description: "Shashlik" is a multiplayer simulator of kebab cooking. You will make marinade, prepare coals and grill kebabs! You'll also be able to put out the mangal with water, marinate a stone, put a friend on a skewer and drink beer!

name: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
description: Summon your stands and brawl it out! Dive into the thrill of mowing down enemies, synthesizing and upgrading, mining, forging gear, unlocking new characters and equipment. Discover unique stands combos and craft your own battle style to break through the chaos!

name: Traxion 3000
description: Traxion 3000 is a cave-flyer set in outer space. Explore the underground caves of 6 different alien planet, fight enemies, solve puzzles and salvage the valuable cargo pods. Supports up to 4 players.

name: True Nightmare: Roadside Сafe
description: Immerse yourself in an atmospheric psychological horror with a haunting VHS aesthetic. As a night-shift waitress at a secluded roadside café, serve strange patrons and feel mounting dread. Each night, the nightmare becomes more real, and someone is watching from the darkness. Can you survive?

name: Welcome to Elderfield
description: Welcome to Elderfield is a spooky farming RPG. You can farm, fish, mine, cook, craft, befriend townsfolk, beseech the old gods, investigate mysteries, watch unsettling news programs, get lost in the dead mall, die in your sleep and more. There's lots to do in Elderfield!

name: BrokenLore: Don't Watch
description: In BrokenLore: DON'T WATCH, immerse yourself in the haunting world of Shinji, a young hikikomori trapped in his Tokyo apartment. As his mind unravels, confront a malevolent entity watching from the shadows. Will you uncover the truth before it's too late?

name: Viking Survivors: The Last Ragnarök
description: An action roguelite where you wield ancient weapons and unleash Norse fury on endless waves of monsters. Survive the bullet hell, collect mythic weapons, and prove you're the ultimate Viking warrior.

name: Gokuraku Jong Premium
description: Gokuraku Jong Premium is an enhanced port of the mahjong puzzle game Gokuraku Jong which includes several new modes. Time Attack mode gives the player a 3-minute time limit to earn the highest score possible, Mission 16 mode gives the player 16 different mahjong hands to complete in a single play, and Yakuman Attack mode asks the player to get as many Yakuman (the highest-scoring Mahjong hands) as possible in a single game. It also adds in a new collectibles system, along with a handful of other tweaks.

name: Set with Friends
description: An online version of the classic card game SET, which is a puzzle card game that can be played alone or with others

name: Lego Star Wars: End of War
description: Lego Star Wars: End of War sends the player on a journey throughout the last episode of the clone wars, including things like the Ashoka and Maul fight, with the style of the Lego Star Wars games.

name: Social Warfare
description: Be a troll-for-hire on social media! You will serve in the Social Warfare battalion and promote loyalty to the Great Kingdom of Eternia, while disrupting society in the enemy nation.

name: Byte The Dust
description: Make your way through increasingly harder platform sections. But be aware, one small error and it's back to the beginning for you!

name: Starless Abyss
description: Earth has fallen. Science and the Occult have united forces to brace for the arrival of the Eldritch. But will the efforts against this strange, alien race be enough? Play as one of many Proximae used to help defend humanity in this turn-based, roguelike, intergalactic deck builder.

name: 6 Games
description: An obscure compilation consisiting of six games for the ZX81.

name: AlcremieStudio
description: Whip up your own Alcremie!

name: Demon Hunt
description: Demon Hunt is a rogue-lite top down shooter set in cursed lands overrun by demons, featuring intense boss fights and evolving weapons. Discover powerful artifacts, loot unique items and create outrageous synergies. Spend collected resources at your base to upgrade and unlock new ways of playing.

name: Unlimited Trees' Sonic 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Rush Legacy
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Panic
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Home Saver
description: Sin descripción

name: Steam Drulls
description: The Empire of Cats is trying to take over the Sky World with their steam-powered mechs! It's up to you to fight back in this 3D platformer.

name: Sonic: Project Purple
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Project Twisted
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Max
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Crisis Twilight Revelation
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Anniversary
description: Sin descripción

name: Rebuild of Shadow Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: The Spiral
description: The Spiral is a first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. To survive, you must descend into darkness and confront the nightmares within. Explore the randomized dungeon, find powerful equipment, and fight for your life.

name: Gravity Forge
description: Master gravity and parkour skills to slay hordes of enemies. As an elegant assassin, you can play solo or in co-op with friends.

name: XXX NIGHTSHIFT
description: Welcome to World’s End, Mount Hope, Antarctica, 2086 CE. You’re a Patrol Operative, and it’s entirely up to you how you spend your polar nights—solving gruesome murders, breaking sacred hearts, or just killing bloody time, in this true detective RPG XXX NIGHTSHIFT.

name: Ghost Frequency
description: In Ghost Frequency, you are a ghost hunter from PIT - Paranormal Investigation Team. Your mission is to locate a sinister spirit using the EMF Ghost Detector to track paranormal activity, the IR Thermal Camera to reveal hidden entities, and the EVP Digital Recorder to capture eerie voices.

name: AuraVale
description: AuraVale is a cozy life-sim where your words shape your story. Create your Aura, design your perfect home, and build lasting relationships. Develop a thriving town and invite friends to be your neighbors.

name: G-Rebels
description: G-Rebels: An action-packed combat flight sim in a dystopian open world full of intrigue, free exploration and dangerous missions. As part of an elite unit, it is your job to ensure law and order. A secret mission calls everything into question: are you on the right side or part of a conspiracy?

name: Blood of Mehran
description: In Blood of Mehran, explore sweeping sand dunes, bustling bazaars and sprawling palaces. Go blade to blade with enemies, pick them off from a distance with your arrows, or slip by them like a ghost. Level up and build your legend.

name: Mentari
description: In a world frozen by The Stillness, one girl holds the power to undo the damage. Mentari is an action-adventure game where you take control of the titular heroine to make the world move again, through a unique, dance-based combat system.

name: Whimside
description: A creature collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen & fits easily into your routine. Whether you're working, studying, or relaxing, Whimside is always ready to offer you cozy pauses. Capture rare creatures, create new species & decorate your whimsical space in this soothing adventure.

name: Mimic Alert
description: You are on a service to detect and destroy mimics - creatures capable of taking the form of any object. Your task is to carefully inspect your surroundings, use all your attentiveness and various tools to detect mimics.

name: Farming Through The End
description: In Farming Through The End, players navigate a zombie apocalypse by growing food, gathering resources, and fortifying their land, as farming becomes humanity's last hope for survival.

name: Back Alley Arcane Shop
description: Back Alley Arcane Shop is a fantasy world-based furry gay romance visual novel. You become the protagonist - Resque, who runs a arcane shop in a back alley, and you will meet four furries. Discover the fate and future of the Arcane shop with your partner.

name: Tavern of Spear
description:
You play as "Eyvind"， a young wolf warrior from The Lost Spear Tribe who has come of age.

Following a tribal tradition, Eyvind leaves home and sets out on a journey.

You are the young adventurer from the Lost Spear Tribe who’s come of age and ready to prove himself as an adventurer.

But adventure leads you to a strange tavern tucked in a foggy forest.

Despite the threat outside, the beer is great, and the company is fun to be with.

Inspired by Fallout 1/2. DND, Teraurge, Ruina and Corruption of Champion.

name: BangXBang
description: Bang x Bang is a text adventure game with elements of homosexual love, in which you are the son of a gangster, and even though you don't want to get involved in your "family business", one day a big gangster wolf suddenly finds you, then your peaceful life is far away from you...​

name: Art of Running
description: Sin descripción

name: Clash Force 2
description: Introducing Clash Force 2! The evil General Crackman has returned, hacking Clash Force’s weapons systems and launching a full scale attack on their home turf! Once again, Voom the Rhinoceros, Scorpido the Scorpion, and Echid, the aptly named Echidna, must armor up, take back their base, and launch an assault on Crackman’s powered up forces!

name: Sonic Arcus 2D
description: Sin descripción

name: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery
description: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery is an immersive post-apocalyptic trucking simulation game where players navigate the dangerous and desolate landscapes of the Deadlands.

name: Choices Matter: Mega City
description: Explore Mega City in a post-apocalyptic card game. Choose, survive, and take control of your fate.

name: Rhythm Witch: Beat Death
description: Rhythm Witch: Beat Death is a game that melds rhythm and survival. Attack to the rhythm of the music while dodging monsters who move and attack to the beat. On your journey to eternal beauty, defeat dancing freaks, ghouls, dragon, and more!

name: Dinocop
description: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side by side, you're the one and only Dinocop. And you got a meaty case to crack. In this mystery game set in a day cycle, uncover secrets scattered through time.

name: Spellscaper
description:
Spellscaper is a multiplayer creative sandbox where players can create gaming worlds with others.
The game empowers players to create their own gaming experiences with the help of AI. Ask N.U.R.D. what you want to create and they'll make it for you! Add gaming behaviors to your creations to make the experience even better.

name: Trading Kingdom
description: Embark on a journey from a humble farmer to a powerful merchant in 15th century Venice. Compete against rival traders, expand your influence, and build your Trading Kingdom in a land where wealth is power.

name: Firefighter Wizard: The Elemental Order
description: FFW is a third-person action-adventure game with stylized firefighting. Use the power of magic to douse burning cities and fight fire forces of nature. Explore a fantasy world and find clues to the source of the disaster that turned once peaceful land into a fiery inferno.

name: Bat to the Beat
description: Swing your bat to the beat in this cricket-themed rhythm action game. Travel the world, mastering the unique rhythms of each location with easy-to-learn two button controls. Score as many runs as you can, batting to the beat and switching between attack and defense.

name: F*ck This Job
description: Tired of work? In F*ck This Job, release your pent-up stress! Use office supplies as weapons and face off against colleagues, bosses, and managers. Your goal is simple: escape this hellish company alive!

name: Shamoji
description: Serve the rice making sure the bowl is facing the right way.

name: VTOL VR: AH-94 Attack Helicopter
description: The AH-94 is a twin-turboshaft attack helicopter with a tandem cockpit for two pilots. It features nose mounted optical sensors, and can mount a 20mm rotary cannon or 30mm chain gun. It is capable of carrying various air-to-ground missiles, rockets, and other equipment on 4 wing pylons, as well as two small air-to-air missiles on each wing tip.

name: Frontier Legends
description: Welcome to Frontier Legends, the ultimate Wild West adventure where survival, crafting, and exploration come together in an expansive open world. Step into the boots of a brave settler who has just arrived by train, ready to stake your claim on the new frontier filled with untold mysteries.

name: Corridor Geodesic
description: Corridor Geodesic is a steampunk style puzzle game all about collapsing and expanding the level around you to descend deeper into an ominous facility.

name: Brewtopia
description: Build up your perfect coffee utopia as you challenge corporate coffee control through sustainable growing and harvesting your coffee cherry plants. Grow your very own beans, channel your inner barista as you brew up drinks, help out your friendly neighbours, and discover rare coffee varieties.

name: Pocket Necromancer
description: Assemble a diverse army of minions, each with unique abilities and personalities. From spell-casting mages to sturdy skeletal knights, select your squad and lead them into battle against encroaching forces.​

name: Identifile
description:
Navigate your operating system and battle viruses in this bullethell roguelike where folders act as treacherous dungeon rooms!

Your computer has been infected by an unknown virus, and with your antivirus down, it’s up to you—the cursor—to save it from being overrun. This action-packed roguelike plunges you into the depths of your file explorer, where every folder is a dungeon teeming with threats, and every file holds secrets, treasures, and dangers.

Navigate through procedurally generated levels filled with relentless viruses. Utilize unique circling combat mechanics to eliminate threats, all while collecting powerful EXE files that radically change the gameplay. Inspired by Pokemon Ranger and The Binding of Isaac, Identifile seamlessly blends bullet hell action with deep exploration. Uncover hidden paths, discover game-altering power-ups, and reclaim your system, one dungeon at a time.

name: The Ferry
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to run the evening ferry across a calm bay? Scotto Bay's ferryman managed to break his leg mere days before a major festival and you're filling in. Unfortunately, the festival isn't the only big event, as a major storm is brewing and it's up to you to evacuate the nearby island. Do you have what it takes to help get everyone to safety?

name: Scarlet's Haunted Hotel
description: A time management game with 60 levels. Scarlet, a young mother, arrives at a charming seaside hotel run by a distant relative, only to find herself at the center of a dark and mysterious saga. As she navigates the potential inheritance of the hotel, unsettling visions and a suspicious death cast a shadow over her stay.

name: Rising Heat
description: Rising Heat is a fast-paced horde survival game combining momentum-based movement with strategic, deck-builder-style upgrades. Play the demo today and face waves of cyborg enemies, multi-stage bosses, and bullet-hell battles. Customize your build with powerful ‘hacks,’ discover synergies, and unlock new pilots and ships for endless variety. Experiment with Rising Heat’s Fusion mechanic to create unique playstyles and dominate the arena!

name: Pixelmancy
description: Pixelmancy is a bullet heaven action-roguelite where you play as a wizard battling demon hordes. Unlock legendary staves and tomes, upgrade your spell and character strength, and survive waves of enemies. Face minibosses, complete events, and grow stronger with every battle!

name: Angelo and Deemon 2: Too Hell of a Quest
description: Angelo and Deemon are back in this point-and-click adventure! Angelo’s quest for viral fame leads him to Heaven, where divine mysteries and celestial puzzles await. Join him and Deemon as they meet heavenly beings and tackle divine dilemmas.

name: Ark Odyssey
description: Ark Odyssey is a top-down arcade shooter that lets you command an army of starships to fight against the force of void! Gather your fleet into formations, and build your team of evolving synergistic compositions. Order your army of Starforce through space and protect the cosmos!

name: Hook Line and Sniper
description: You are a fish. Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper! In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style.

name: Wordban
description: Wordban is a text-based Sokoban-style game where you control "Wordo" to push boxes and trigger each level's rules, altering the boxes' layout, quantity, and even attributes. Wordo is waiting to explore with you in over 100 unique levels.

name: Hyper 2
description: Defend your tower for as long as you can from the aliens invading your space! Level up, earn money and new units, and strategically place them in the grid.

name: Intercolonies
description: Intercolonies takes place in post-apocalyptic world where colonies are isolated. Use your vehicle to transport people between them. Upgrade and customize your car to navigate treacherous terrain and overcome post-apocalyptic challenges.

name: Blink and Die Replay
description: Blink and Die is a musical bullet hell with arcade aesthetics, in first-person, where you must move 360 degrees to dodge bars that moves to the song's rhythm and comes from all angles.

name: Meso
description: Meso is a fast-paced exploration-action game with arcade feel and a unique underwater movement. Enter the microcosmic world of puddles and save the ecosystem. Fight against the algae plague and the mysterious invaders.

name: Edward's Manor
description: The Edwards are moving! And luckily for you, that comes with a paycheck. Help tag the pending furniture for Don Jorge's Moving Company. We are counting on you! Disclosure: D.J.M.C. is not liable for any damages or deaths during your work hours.

name: Wild Script: Nature
description: Incredible combination of roguelike, RPG and group strategy. Immerse yourself in the wild nature of a mysterious world.

name: Hawthorn
description: Former developers from Bethesda, BioWare, and Naughty Dog bring you a sandbox RPG realm of anthropomorphic animals and fairy creatures. Play co-op or solo as you build a village of memorable NPCs, farm, craft, explore, and celebrate the seasons in an ever-changing world bigger than you.

name: Deeplanders
description: DEEPLANDERS is a relaxing, minimalist strategic building game where you must satisfy the needs of the Deeplanders to populate the depths. Explore, build, and decorate your own underground kingdom... and when you're ready, embark on a journey to new, unexplored depths!

name: Mazer Laser
description: Dodge, teleport, and advance. Challenge yourself by moving at the speed of light through all kinds of mazes in this Arcade game, where precision and speed will be your best allies.

name: Urban Heat
description: Crew up and conquer the war for power on the streets in Urban Heat! Immerse yourself in the gritty, action-packed urban warzone of this epic multiplayer first-person shooter (FPS) game!

name: Let's Sing 2025 with UK Hits
description: Standard Edition: The Let’s Sing 2025 Standard edition includes 35 songs and a one month free trial of VIP Pass.

name: Live Action-Bit Theater "Route Yonroku"
description: Suzunone Miu and Rinto will perform a live show in "Live Action-BIT THEATER"!Topping off the live show with energetic voices and sounds!

name: Hide 'N Seek!
description: ...8, 9, 10. Ready or not, here I come!

name: Cup Hand Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Magiscapes
description: Welcome to Magiscapes, the world's first AI sandbox adventure! Build your camp, create AI companions, and form unique bonds through interactions. Embark on a journey of discovery and enjoy the freedom to explore!

name: Paris Games Fail!
description: Satiric cartoony roguelite deckbuilder inspired by Blackjack rules. Play strategically cards depicting true events of the 2024 olympics. Collect boosters and trigger hilarious combos. Complete challenges while you burn through your deck, keeping your eyes on the prize: achieving world-class failure.

name: Byterage
description: Byterage: Epic Battle Against the Quantum Legion Byteplex City is under the occupation of the Quantum Legion. The only hope is Steel X, fighting with his katana. Defeat enemies with fast and fluid combat. Slow down time to dodge bullets and prove your skills in this challenging experience.

name: Darkly Glass
description: Trade your soul for digital fame in this psychological visual novel. As fallen tech mogul Doran White, navigate a treacherous social media landscape. Your choices shape his fate in this hand-drawn, neuroscience-inspired reimagining of Oscar Wilde's classic.

name: The Shattered Knight of Elaria
description: A game where you play as a trapped soul of a knight in a castle who meets another soul of an alchemist trapped in a lantern. You set out to make amends with your brother, who you regret causing a disaster that ends up trapping the souls within the castle.

name: Lurks Within Walls
description:
Lurks Within Walls is a tense survival horror game combining modern dungeon RPGs' exploration elements with fast-paced turn-based combat. Explore a series of cursed environments filled with terrifying creatures illustrated by the renowned artist Trevor Henderson.

A building under quarantine. Residents isolated. Those who failed to isolate themselves now stagger through the corridors, contaminated. But it's not just the infected residents—the darkness conceals other anomalies. It feels as if the building itself is alive.

name: Droian
description: Meet I.A.N, the Interplanetary Android Navigator, and humanity's last hope. With a heart of steel and unwavering determination, I.A.N is on a mission to navigate the treacherous depths of an distant isolated moon. Armed with advanced technology and a noble purpose, this extraordinary android will guide you through the haunting realms of DROIAN, all while reminding us that the fight to save humanity is a journey we all share.

name: Isoland: Pumpkin Town
description: ISOLAND Pumpkin Town? What the hell kind of game is this and what does it have to do with ISOLAND, Mr Pumpkin.

name: Well to Hell
description: A short first-person horror game where you play as an urban explorer trapped at the bottom of a well. Find a way out before it finds you.

name: City of Stolen Worlds
description: A mysterious creature has torn your home from reality. Explore the City of Stolen Worlds, uncover the secrets of its inhabitants, and try to find your way back. Or perhaps you want to become the new Master?

name: Splintered
description: A unique RPG where the villain randomizes the world with each defeat. Start with a classic RPG experience, then delve into shifting worlds where the overworld, items, and enemies shuffle, creating new challenges. Conquer these worlds to unravel the story and make your way to the final showdown!

name: MysteryScrolls
description: Are you ready to become a medieval cryptex scroll master?

name: Word Rocket
description: Welcome to the Interplanetary Defense Agency, cadet!

name: Poco's Maze Adventure
description: Poco wants to go out and play, but the world just keeps getting in her way! Help Poco navigate the mazes while keeping an eye out for tasty fish snacks.

name: Monster Elevator
description: As a federally mandated minimum wage servant for the esteemed Monster Tower Resort and Spa, your goal is to go floor to floor constructing

name: Pizza Delivery in a Storm
description: A motorbike action game where you deliver pizzas in a storm

name: Sym-Bionic Titan: Teenage Warriors
description: A 2D platformer browser game based on the cartoon series Sym-bionic Titan. You can choose between two characters: Lance or Ilana, to defeat enemies and progess through the levels.

name: Investment Run
description: Start from rags and get to the moon by making the right investments! Walk your way to the finish line by collecting money and avoiding obstacles! Beware of the gold diggers, they try to take all your money away from you! Will you reach your private helicopter and create your own empire on it? Will you become the new Jeff Bezos / Warren Buffet / Elon Musk? Simple and intuitive game for everybody to become rich and stay away from poverty! Controls are easy, you will love it!

name: Iris to Id: Ghosts in the Machine
description: A tale about four unexpected friends experiencing sinister events related to the sins of their past

name: Escape from Sharptooth Valley
description:
Escape from Sharptooth Valley is a single-player narrative game to walk, explore, fight, or befriend!

Choose your own story and discover the origins of the Gen-like life in the World of Nefthar.

name: Project Viper
description: Sin descripción

name: Valheim: The Bog Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Konfronto
description: Sci-fi roguelike auto battler where you command an intergalactic carrier, outfitting it with new spacecraft and technologies to take on other players in asynchronous multiplayer

name: Jugglenoid
description: Welcome to the circus. Exciting adventures await you with funny clowns. The clowns came up with a special juggling machine and called it Jugglenoid.

name: Minimal Arcade
description: three very small games for playdate

name: Roped In: Deuces Wild
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinth
description: Design your character and embark on a perilous quest filled with mystery, danger, and untold treasures. Explore winding corridors, engage in strategic turn-based battles, and plunder loot from the labyrinthine depths.

name: Super Conductor
description: Redirect the train to collect 100 coins across 30+ levels, which range from straightforward tracks to spaghetti-like tangles

name: Diction
description:
Diction is a word based puzzle game, where you have to make as many unique words as possible.
You're given a starting word, and your goal is to turn it into a different word by adding, changing or removing only a single letter at a time. Then keep it up by changing your new word into a different one.

name: Remington Upland Game Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Crown of Ashes and Flames
description:
Crown of Ashes and Flames is a fantasy interactive fiction game, free to play on pc and mobile! You play as the only remaining member of the royal family of Vesphire; living in the home of the man that took away everything from you.

It is currently in development and each chapter will be released as they are finished.

name: Braaains
description: Braaains is an exciting, deep, action-packed game for Facebook users. Players are able to build a team of amazing Zombies, amassing a horde and battling their friends. Players can watch the combat happen right before their eyes, leveling up their player and buying new weapons, enhancements, and abilities. There is no stop to the fun players can have customizing and creating a unique and powerful horde of Zombies.

name: Magician
description: Magician is an episodically released psychological horror visual novel. Currently, only the first day is out.

name: Twin-Stick Survivors
description: In this Tower Defense Survivor Game, the skill tree is on the ground of the battle map. Expand your base to capture more of the map and unlock more upgrades. Defend your position against thousands of enemies as they flow over the map.

name: Turmoil: Deeper Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Side Alley
description: The city is a labyrinth. You always knew it, you just didn't have time to try different paths. Now, you have no choice. Did your coworker put a curse on you? Find out in this bleak horror visual novel featuring point-and-click gameplay elements.

name: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri: The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs
description:
A Fanmade Touhou Project DRPG With Not-So-Easy Boss Fights!
The girls of Gensokyo weave together a dungeon RPG with an estimated playtime of 30~50 hours. Pick a frontline of 4 and a rear of 8 to form a party of 12 characters out of a pool over 40+ and conquer extensive dungeons!

The girls of Gensokyo weave together a DRPG with not-so-easy boss fights! Form a party of 12 allies out of a pool of 40+, and create with 1000+ skills to choose from! Hack, slash, and grow stronger, then make builds (or counter-builds!) to take down powerful bosses awaiting you in the dungeons.

name: Alien: Isolation 2
description:
The announcement was made on Monday 7 October 2024 to coincide with the 10th anniversary of the original game’s release.

“On the 10th anniversary, it seems only fitting to let you know that we have heard your distress calls loud and clear,” said Al Hope, creative director at developer Creative Assembly.

name: Severed
description: Sin descripción

name: Milcham: From the Ashes of Hearts
description: A girl of low social class goes undercover to infiltrate a prestigious high school, tasked with a perilous mission.

name: Astral Wield
description: Embark on Felix's journey to stop an evil King from starting a great war between kingdoms.

name: ETea
description: Help Glorbo master the art of making boba to satisfy customers and take down bosses in this unique blend of simulation and bobarista action!

name: Mindfate
description: After awakening in a mental hospital, Yuriko’s search for an escape turns into a journey through her disturbing past. With each step forward, normality fades away revealing a surreal world where nothing is as it seems.

name: Spherebuddie 64
description: Embark on an adventure through vibrant 3D environments crafted with nostalgic pixel art, blending classic aesthetics with modern gameplay mechanics. Maneuver your spherical hero through challenging platforming with precise jumps and dash.

name: Steam Veins
description: The vampires help humanity with steampunk technologies, BUT you were bitten—now hunt the Master Lord King Vampire before you become his servant.

name: Loss
description: Uncover the truth in Loss, a story-driven game about a teenage boy recalling the tragedies of his family. Explore a house, solve puzzles and gather items. All while fighting the ghosts from your past.

name: Fix This House
description: A relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time.

name: Go North
description: experience the first immersive maze adventure ever as you help Dara meet the Maze God and get her wish granted by navigating countless beautiful mazes and labyrinths. but something sinister seems to be corrupting the mazes. something… or someone.

name: Weatherman
description: Weatherman is a fast thinking puzzle simulation game where you rapidly assess gadgets to predict the weather. Your reports save lives.

name: Galactic Caretaker
description: A space civilisation management game. Play as a Galactic Caretaker, controlling the growth of developing civilisations. Ensure each society reaches their galactic exploration potential….but not before they are ready.

name: Deepest Dungeons
description: Venture into the ever-shifting labyrinth of Deepest Dungeons, a rogue-like with extraction elements. Explore a maze that changes with each attempt, battle enemies, avoid deadly traps and collect gear. Survive long enough to reach deeper levels, or escape with your belongings and try a new descend.

name: Dr. Priori’s Time Escape
description: Welcome back to the Curiosity Shop of Dr. A. Priori. Explore the building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery! Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.

name: Anarchy Hops
description: Play as a violent bunny with a giant pair of scissors.

name: The Great Fluctus
description: A relaxing game to zone out for an hour, all while exploring cozy alien worlds, trading with mutants, rebuilding society and saving the world - no pressure, right?

name: Wool at the Gates
description: Defend your base from hordes of invading sheep. Fight as a hero with powerful abilities or shapeshift into a flying eyeball to traverse the battlefield and command troops. Build your defenses and economy while creating synergies that unlock class bonuses and perks for your hero, troops, and towers.

name: Godstone Tactics
description: An indie turn-based strategy game. Position your animal heroes in the isometric arena, protect your King, and defeat the enemy King. Adapt your tactics on various boards and master the strategic depth to win.

name: Silent Sadie
description: A puzzle-platformer in Hollywood's golden age. Join Sadie on her quest to become a star, tackling puzzles, stealth challenges, and fast-paced platforming. Inspired by silent film legends, this game combines humor, visual gags, and challenging gameplay in a charming adventure.

name: Infinity Sweeper
description: Infinity Sweeper is similar to the classic Minesweeper, but turned into an endless rogue-lite adventure. Navigate through an ever-expanding grid filled with dangerous traps, enemies, and valuable treasures, trying to survive as long as possible.

name: Meteor Shower
description: Sin descripción

name: The Shade Forest
description: Fabulous, FREE and fun 90's inspired platformer game for Android, iOS and PC. Help Drag Queen Amanda Sparks to survive the Shade Forest and rescue her friend from the evil hands of the Hypocritics gang!

name: Vampire Domain
description: Summon hordes of minions to defend your realm against invading heroes in this fast-paced fantasy strategy game. Unlock permanent upgrades, new levels and more advanced minions to survive the ever-growing threat.

name: Yume Kakigori
description: Experience a text adventure unlike any other, communicate with characters through the art of color mixing.

name: Mythical Love
description:
Welcome to Mythic High, the highschool of mythical creatures where we can have great moments together with species and sex equality.
You can choose to be one of them and build your relationship to learn more about different kinds of love. So young and colourful. BUT sometimes, when something goes overboard, everything could collapse apart, including love. So choose wisely.

name: Science Sleuths Vol. 1: Mysteries of the Blob and the Exploding Lawnmowers
description: Sin descripción

name: Dysto-wanderer
description: Dive into a puzzle adventure in the post-apocalyptic world of dysto-wanderer. Join Pia, lost in the toxic slums of a ruined city, as she searches for a safe place. Explore a destroyed civilization, solve intricate puzzles, and survive the harsh environment along the way.

name: Blackjack and Pomodoro Mystery
description:
"Human, go to work."

In the library, you are stuck with Blackjack, an unknown living creature that looks like a cat. Unexpectedly, lots of tomatoes appear in the library. It's also up to you and BJ to solve the mystery and identify the person who left the tomatoes lying around.

This is Pomodoro timer which has 25 minutes working-5 minutes resting and 60 minutes working-10 minute resting plans for player to select and work along with the moving black cat playing around the room.

name: UnHumanize
description: Can technology help humans achieve their dreams, or is fighting fate a big gamble for humanity?

name: Hit n' Bit
description: A dark fantasy Metroidvania platformer. Embark on two different journeys where you will fight monsters, explore a story-rich world, and encounter challenging puzzles. Reunite the royal siblings, defy the machinations of old gods, and redefine destiny.

name: Inventris TD
description: A tower defense shooter where the combat happens inside your inventories.

name: Rain Check
description:
Rain Check is a mystery thriller visual novel set in a coastal city with unusual weather patterns where nothing seems quite right.

Join Theodore as he turns to a wolf he meets, along with a clashing team of investigators, in a desperate attempt to find answers and uncover the truth about the strange phenomena of the city, and whatever else may be lurking in the shadows.

name: Gnomecart Havoc
description: A roguelite shooter with snakelike elements. You control a group of Gnomes sitting in carts trying to take back their home. Explore the cursed, ever changing mine, upgrade your crew with treasures you’ll find in your journey and destroy every monster that stands in your way.

name: Beep Boop
description: Beep is back, and this time he has a sidekick, Boop! Blast your way through 100 challenging levels and 5 boss fights, in this classic elimination platformer, modelled on the legendary Bubble Bobble series.

name: Unicycle Giraffe
description: Unicycle Giraffe is a balancing game about giraffes, fancy hats & making new friends. Jump on a unicycle and earn yourself some coin to pay back your debts in this cute and colourful physics wobbler.

name: Kraktures
description: Collect, and fight powerful creatures known as Kraktures in turn-based or realtime RPG battles.

name: Ascension: The Immortal Alchemist
description:
Ascension follows the trials and tribulations of an Immortal Alchemist and his quest throughout time to transmute humans in to gods. Players descend into an ancient labyrinth where their souls are tested by cosmic forces to challenge the limitations of their mortality. Do you have what it takes?

Ascension is a modern resurrection of the classic 3D Action Adventure Genre - Inspired by the legendary writings of Hermes Trismegistus - a figure who rose to prominence in the mystery schools of Hellenistic Egypt & Greece, and whose timeless teachings are as relevant today; as they were when they were written.

Action-adventure, puzzle, platforming, atmospheric, difficult, speedrunner, escape room, maze

name: The Fall: Act I
description: The story of three foreign students at a private British boarding school. Becoming information brokers within the school walls brought them money and respect, but knowledge can also bring trouble.

name: What Remains
description: A non-linear, eerie visual novel inspired by Ukrainian folklore. Go caroling with Goat, Bear, and Granny to make choices that decide the villagers' fate, save dozens, or lead to disasters. Learn how powerful words and silence can be.

name: Slitherise
description: A snake robot climbs up a mysterious world. The only control is the mouse, and the goal is to aim higher.

name: Love in an Enchanted Realm
description: Lost in a magical world where true love is your only escape - form powerful connections, outsmart deadly enemies, and resist the temptation of a dangerous villain who swears you're destined to be his.

name: Anterris
description: Collect and train powerful creatures, known as Antera, as you battle through dungeons. Discover rare loot and evolve your squad by freely swapping between creatures while battling enemies in a fast-paced creature-collecting action RPG!

name: The Oneironaut
description: Dive into the surreal world of 'The Oneironaut,' where you'll race through the dreams of artists in this mesmerizing parkour runner. Jump, slide, and vault your way through fantastical landscapes, with each airborne vault propelling you to greater heights.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix Mini-Game
description: On the website for the video game Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix there was plans for a promotional mini-game to be released alongside it. The game was labeled as coming soon under the "Mini-Game" tab on the official website for the game, however was never released. No details of the game were ever released and it is uncertain what the contents of the game were to be, apart from the game being built in Adobe Flash based on the link being labeled as "flashgame" within the site's HTML code.

name: Best Served Cold
description: Can you mix a cocktail while eye-to-eye with a criminal? Find out in Best Served Cold, a murder mystery set in a bustling speakeasy where you serve customers, make friends and enemies, and solve crimes. At the Nightcap bar, prohibition is a killer… and so are some of your customers!

name: Midheaven: Winds of Ambition
description:
Midheaven: Winds of Ambition follows the tale of a young Mahyine (an original species of the Midheaven saga, with naga-like features) noble in court who determines to follow their ambitions, along with the presence of one of the four Regals.

Winds of Ambition is a stats-raising visual novel, where every choice can result in the most fatal outcome. The objective of the game is keeping the protagonist alive for 12 seasons, and marry one of the four Regals.

name: Eastern Cuisine Tycoon
