description: A traditional Chinese food simulation cooking game. Play the role of a talented Chinese food chef, experiencing the production process of traditional Chinese cuisine firsthand, gradually transforming your small inn into a renowned food paradise.

name: Swan Song
description: Solve puzzles in an old music box by creating your own music scales. Play your composition by cranking the box and watch it come to life! Will you get your little goose safely to it's nest?

name: Sacrificial God
description: You were sacrificed and now have to find god. You can do this by talking to other creatures that were sacrificed. Will you be able to do this? Find it out by speaking to the creatures of Heaven!

name: 9mm Girls The Visual Novel
description:
9mm Girls The Visual Novel is an LGBTQ+ urban fantasy/action project produced by the duo Soliko6, based on the 9mm Girls Webcomic.

The project focuses on the relations between you (the player) and complex characters while following an intricate storyline taking place in the dark megalopolis of Skyline City.
Your choices through the game will impact the ending but also the bonds you wish to build with the characters.

name: Zombie Cards: Survival Showdown
description: Zombie Cards: Survival Showdown is a card game with a zombie survival theme.

name: Manickologi
description: Manickologi is a game about getting sidetracked on your way back home. Follow mani the manickologist and his robot friend Stefan on their adventure. Swap between characters to make use of their unique skillsets. Collect hidden treasures and complete quests.

name: Afterlife: The Game
description: After your untimely death in the previous game you start off your afterlife as a lovely ghost on a mission to correct past mistakes and have lots of fun along the way!

name: Looppip
description: Looppip is a magical seed that carries an ancient hourglass with the power to turn back time. Your mission is to save the bee hives, essential for the survival of life on Earth, and reverse the environmental collapse threatening nature.

name: Into the Depth of the Sky
description: Into the Depth of the Sky is a heartwarming fantasy/mystery/slice-of-life otome game with a dash of action.

name: Gakutensoku
description: In the year of new 1940, the earth's population was replaced by androids created by man after the devastating effect of the nuclear war. androids made their own robot utopia, but under the glimmer of the cities, hides a dark secret Seigi Kazuichi was another police officer android doing his duty, capturing evildoers who dares destabilize the peace of the utopia, but one event would change his life forever and entangle him in a series of bizarre murder cases.

name: Eletta
description: Explore an unfamiliar place filled with powerful enemies, advanced technology and scientific advancements in Eletta, an action game about a young girl looking for a way back home.

name: LEGO: City Builder
description: Mayor Fleck is on holiday and you're in charge! Help new city dwellers connect using the all-new Road Plates and bring LEGO City to life!

name: Phá Kén: Khúc Điêu Linh
description: Sin descripción

name: Coat of Many Feathers
description:
To settle a decades-long war for territorial sovereignty, Lord Trieu Da of the Qin and King An Duong Vuong of Au Lac agreed to a political marriage between their firstborn children. In anticipation for the wedding, Lord Trieu Da sent his son, Trong Thuy, to remain at Au Lac's Royal Citadel as a show of the Qin's goodwill.

On the other end, Princess My Chau is ecstatic at getting an opportunity to meet someone from beyond the citadel walls. Will you be able to aid her attempts to befriend the kindly yet distant Trong Thuy? Or will you let their relationship fall apart before it could even begin?

name: We Grew Up in War
description: Discover the stories of kids growing up in the midst of armed conflicts over the last three decades. Inspired by real testimonies, this narrative adventure follows the lives of children from Bosnia, Syria, and Ukraine.

name: Snow Storm
description: Snow Storm is a flash game where you clear the snow at a parking lot. Clearing many of the snow will cause an icon of hot chocolate to appear and will take you to the next level.

name: Verho
description: Verho is a Dungeon Crawler Dark RPG game that is inspired by games like "King's Field" and "Lunacid".

name: Lost Key: The Path of Illumination
description: An ancient order that protects a secret, kept hidden for centuries. An unexpected crime that causes you to be accused of the murder of a friend. Solve the mysteries and puzzles of a story full of esotericism to prove the truth about your innocence and hold the real murderer responsible.

name: iQuest Social Studies: Grade 5
description: iQuest Social Studies: Grade 5 is an educational game based around social studies released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 10-11.

name: iQuest Social Studies: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Social Studies: Grades 6-8 is an educational game based around social studies released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 11-14.

name: iQuest Starter Pack Cartridge
description: iQuest Starter Pack Cartridge is a game bundled in with the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system.

name: iQuest Science: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Science: Grades 6-8 is an educational science game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 11-14.

name: iQuest Science: Grade 5
description: iQuest Science: Grade 5 is an educational science game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 10-11.

name: iQuest Math: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Math: Grades 6-8 is an educational math game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system. It is a continuation of iQuest Math: Grade 5 for ages 11-14.

name: iQuest Math: Grade 5
description: iQuest Math: Grade 5 is an educational math game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: SpongeBob SquarePants is an educational game developed for the Fisher-Price iXL Learning System.

name: The Stars Under Lockehurst
description:
The Stars Under Lockehurst is a romantic supernatural mystery visual novel about a grad student visiting their friend in the small coastal town, Cape Lockehurst. Here, they unravel the mysteries behind recent disappearances and peculiar happenings around town.

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s Call of Cthulhu and similar works, this game explores fear of the unknown and the unknowable, featuring a cast of unique, romanceable characters (who just might be a little... fishy).

name: Ninth Day Memorial
description: Your friend has died and you have to time-travel in order to save them. Except you don't really want to. And something goes wrong in the process.

name: Hocus Opus
description:
Short visual novel created for the Spooktober 6th Annual Visual Novel Jam.

In this game you will be able to meet different creatures from the imagination world, as well as their struggles. The good news are that, since tonight is Halloween and you are the one deciding how the story goes, you might be able to help them.

name: The Nile God
description: Take control of your very own ancient Egyptian civilization in The Nile God. Start with nothing in a world where resources are scarce and find a way to survive and allow your small city to turn into the largest civilization Cairo has ever seen.

name: Office Crush Dating Simulator
description: A dating simulator where you romance your handsome co-workers and nothing goes wrong.

name: WikiGame
description: In WikiGame, you navigate from a source and to a destination by clicking on WikiLinks.

name: Rekindle
description:
Single, alone, and just plain miserable is not how most people would feel on their birthday, but it’s the sad reality for you. Refusing to have the day be a complete waste, you decide it's worth at least getting a cake for yourself.

Why is it that once you have the cake in hand, fate makes you walk past three incredibly important figures from your past?

What could this even mean for you?

name: Block Fortress 2
description: "Block Fortress 2" lets you build an impenetrable fortress in almost any way imaginable, then puts you in the action trying to defend it! Place walls, turrets, traps, and tons of other specialized defenses to build your base. Choose from dozens of guns and equipment, build an army, and join the fight to defend your stronghold! Put your skills as a builder, commander, and fighter to the test as you try to fend off the relentless enemies of the Blockverse!

name: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: Inkshade
description: Inkshade is a turn-based tactics game carved out of strange wooden miniatures, wrapped in a web of locked rooms, and orchestrated by an otherworldly game master. Victory is not guaranteed, and the only constant is the cruel black ink that flows within the pieces.

name: Drown the Bride
description: Drown the Bride is a point 'n click adventure visual novel game about a young actress who must save her friend from going forward with a bad marriage before it's too late.

name: Black Russia
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Maker II: Uru no Hiken
description: Sin descripción

name: Tactical Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: Straße des Erfolgs
description: A simulation game where you can be successful by doing tasks. 2D, simple grafics, easy learn.

name: Bloody Painter Dating Sim
description: Sin descripción

name: Oceaneers
description: A raft-crafting survival management adventure set on sinkable islands. Control a group of survivors to scavenge, harvest and craft your way to an island colony! Build expedition rafts, research contraptions to keep islands afloat, and create your own floating settlement. CRAFT, FLOAT, SURVIVE!

name: Fortnite: Lockjaw Starter Quest Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Lockjaw Starter Quest Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Sun & Scales Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Duelyst Origins
description: Duelyst Origins is a mix between a card game & board game. Play units, sling spells and equip artifacts to control the battlefield. Choose a faction and build custom decks, all cards are free!

name: Attack of the Mutant Camels '89
description: Sin descripción

name: Pantufa the Cat: Extended Edition
description: Pantufa the Cat: Extended Edition (Pantufa the Cat 2 in Europe) is a modification of Sonic the Hedgehog for the SEGA Genesis / SEGA Mega Drive derived from a similar project from late 2011, Pantufa the Cat.

name: Sonic Uprising
description: SONIC UPRISING is a 2D side-scrolling platform fan project led by bennascar and Team Giga-Drive. Uprising is inspired by the classic formula from the Mega Drive Era of Sonic the Hedgehog, expanding it by taking elements from various other titles in the series. The project's goal is to create a story inspired by SEGA's Sonic Forces, while also being able to tell a narrative that goes far beyond a simple reboot.

name: Ashley: The One-Spell Mage
description: Union of skill with quick thinking. Group monsters, dodge their attacks, collect items, stun them, weaken them and finish them all off at once in this game that mixes action and strategy!

name: Word Whomp HD
description: Think fast and create as many words as you can in Word Whomp HD.

name: Helga the Viking Warrior 5: Dawn of Doom
description: Sin descripción

name: Cast 'n' Blast
description: Cast'N'Blast. It's a magical, action-packed vermin extermination.

name: ACUVAC: A Suck And Blow Adventure
description: ACUVAC is a vacuum physics simulator with action-adventure elements! Suck! Blow! Swing your hose around! Perform various ridiculous challenges! Clean your way to victory!

name: Mario Movie Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Holidays
description: Super Mario Holidays is a fangame about Mario in a strange new world of Holidays.

name: Boo's Treat
description: Complete a variety of objectives to satisfy your supernatural sweet tooth in this action game starring the Boo, Sweeth Boo-th.

name: Super Mario Bros 4: Escapade
description: A Mario game inspired by the Super Mario Bros trilogy and Super Mario World made using the Hello Engine.

name: Super Mario Generations
description: Play as both Classic Mario and Modern Mario in remixed stages based on the levels of the past!

name: Valor & Blade
description:
Step into the shoes of a relentless warrior in this gripping action RPG. Your mission is to purge a dark, foreboding castle fortress of its evil inhabitants. Engage in intense, visceral sword battles and execute stealth kills as you navigate through shadowy corridors and towering battlements, each step bringing you closer to the heart of darkness.

As you progress, unlock powerful special abilities that enhance your combat prowess and strategic options. Whether it’s unleashing devastating attacks or summoning your inner strength, these abilities will be crucial in your quest to cleanse the fortress.

But that’s not all—hidden throughout the castle are legendary swords, each more powerful than the last. Discover these weapons to gain an edge over your enemies, making each encounter a test of skill and strategy.

With a variety of challenges to overcome and a level layout that changes with each playthrough, this game offers an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to embrace the warrior’s path and obliterate the source of evil?

name: Neural Dominion
description: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game with JRPG combat. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime-ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Giana Sisters: Project Radiant
description: A fangame for the unlikely run 'n' jump series Giana Sisters.

name: Sokama
description:
Sokama is a Gameboy style platformer developed for GBJAM 12 and DINOJAM4.

66 Million Years Ago...

The sky had darkened and fire rained from above. Plants withered in what little light there was. Animals that didn't adapt, or turn on each other, fell as well. You are a small rodent-like mammal, separated from your family and trying your best to survive.

name: Parasomnia: No REM
description: Parasomnia: no REM is a first-person psychological horror game that explores a theme never before seen in this genre: sleepwalking. This theme is represented through the duality between reality and the sleepwalking state, and their interaction with each other. The game’s mechanics and environments adopt characteristics of this type of sleep disorder, offering both innovative and terrifying gameplay.

name: Paper Mario: Showtime!!
description:
Paper Mario: Showtime!! is a fangame aiming to take the battle systems of Sticker Star and Color Splash, two of the more... infamous... games in the series, and fix 'em up!

Showtime is an arcade experience - Mario fights round after round of enemies, building the strength of his deck with each victory. The whole while, the audience is watching, cheering as he does well, and jeering if he does poorly. The more you please the audience, the higher your score will be! The goal is to get the highest score you can in the amount of time you have!

Mario can use the coins he earns to buy new cards, upgrade old ones, get rid of ones he doesn't need anymore, or upgrade his stats between rounds. And every once in a while, there might be a super-tough enemy to deal with...

name: Crash Car Mania
description: Take part in the death race in this game. Ride fast and crash cars of your rivals. It will be harder with each new level. But you can upgrade your car and open new abilities, it will help you. Roar of the engine and clang of metal will not leave you indifferent.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Borderline
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Chances
description: Sin descripción

name: Cavrncrate
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic DL Adventure
description: Sonic DL Adventure is a work-in-progress 2D fan-game inspired by Sonic Adventure and Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)

name: October Ordeal
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Kart: Ultra Circuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Small Spaces
description: Small Spaces is a relaxing game about turning small apartments into beautifully designed dioramas you'd want to live in. From a simplistic flat in Tokyo to a victorian townhouse in San Francisco. Your only limit is the space itself.

name: AniGuessr
description: AniGuessr is a daily anime quiz. Test your knowledge about Japanese animes with diverse games!

name: Junior MithulBlox
description: Sin descripción

name: Matematyka Dodawanie i odejmowanie
description: In the fairytale land, animals teach children the basics of mathematics: adding, subceding and comparing numbers. The program includes six educational games designed for several players, many rich animations and cheerful music. Animals explain the principles of mathematics and accompany children in solving tasks. This is an education combined with great fun

name: Wyprawa po zlote runo
description: Sin descripción

name: Herkules
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdoms Of Eternity
description: Kingdoms of Eternity is an action RPG where you explore warring kingdoms, battle hordes of demonic enemies, and discover legendary treasures. Customize your skills and shape the future of the kingdom in an epic adventure filled with intense combat and mystery.

name: Ide do szkoly
description: Game for children from the age of five. It is a collection of games and educational games in which the youngest learn, numbers, letters, shapes, colors, animals and plants. Playing exercises memory, develops the ability to mate and think logically. The task of the program is to introduce a child in small steps to the world of school education.

name: Ksiega Dzungli
description: The Jungle Book is a game that depicts the story of a boy raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The whole gives the child a chance to get to know various wild animals, including by taking pictures of them, or showing off their dexterity in saving small wolves. In addition, our Ms. people test their strategic abilities during the “Old Expeditions after the Red AFlow,” pass through the Dark Labyrinths and learn the mystery of Kaa’s Serpent.

name: Alfabet Nauka czytania i pisania
description: Sin descripción

name: Krolewna Sniezka
description: Snow White and seven dwarfs welcome to an amazingly funny and exciting game! All children will enjoy truly funny rhymes and puzzles in the Magic Mirror quiz, search for treasures in the mine, creating your own seven dwarfs, a funny colouring game and many more amazing games! You will be able to test your reflexes during Sweet Marmalading, show off your good memory and observation skills as well as artistic skills in composing your own songs! You can also conjure up a special elixir the effects of which will be truly surprising! First of all, the child will be introduced to the wonderful world of fairy tales and will experience unforgettable adventures!

name: Quality Dreams, Reasonably Priced
description: Work as a body modification consultant in a dystopian future. Talk to clients, make recommendations, and decide how much to upsell them. Your choices will impact each of their lives. Balance helping others with earning enough to save your sick rabbit.

name: Beans Of Production
description: Hone your barista skills to smash daily goals and stave off the thirsty masses in this rogue-lite match-3 deckbuilder. Play your cards right to clear ingredients, beat increasingly demanding quotas, unlock passives, and make it through the work week.

name: The Knight of Thistledown
description:
You wake up to discover a man standing in front of you who introduces himself as ‘The Knight of Thistledown.’ Who is this mysterious stranger and why does the name ‘Thistledown’ sound so familiar?

A short visual novel about taking chances and learning more about yourself.

name: Dazed In Space
description:
It's the year 1989 and the best evening of the year, Halloween! Three kids go trick or treating in the neighborhood but things take a very strange turn and they end up in a great adventure.

Dazed In Space is an adventure game but with an old school JRPG presentation where the focus is on story and simple puzzle solving.

name: Super Mario Bros. NP
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Unleashed
description: Super Mario Unleashed is a 2D Platforming game featuring normal levels in the daytime & reverse levels in the night, with combat.

name: Syobon Action Nostalg
description: Syobon Action Nostalg is a reboot (not a remake) of the rage game named Syobon Action/Cat Mario. This game is done for those players who likes some fair challenge (and specially more for the Syobon fans).

name: An Unfinished Game
description: Welcome to the Unfinished Game Testing facility! As our new tester, you will have to make your way through a series of unexpected experiments in this first-person adventure. Small puzzles, platforming, meta gameplay and a group of silly NPC awaits you in this unpredictable factory.

name: Maze Domination
description: A fast-paced maze game where strategy and speed are key. Control unique robots through intricate mazes, collecting figurines across diverse biomes. Manage energy, avoid or kill enemies, and compete on leaderboards.

name: The Witch's Fairy Tale
description: "The Witch's Fairy Tale" is an action rogue, role-playing game developed by "a little Han Han Duck OVO", you will play a witch, to find magic around the world, your adventure along the way will be written as a fairy tale to pass on.

name: Pluto Lost Its Colors
description: Join Pluto in its quest to reclaim its colors in this chaotic yet rewarding experience! Pluto Lost Its Colors is a fast paced platformer with physics based controls. Take control and master the unpredictable physics of Pluto as you roll, jump, and dash through challenges.

name: My Direct Damag 7 Trillion
description: A strategic pixel-style dungeon-crawling game where you can purchase hundreds of different weapons and armors in the shop, mix and match freely to create the best battle strategy for you, enhance your output capability, defeat bosses, and strive towards the astonishing goal of 70 trillion output.

name: The Oily Depths
description: Pilot an oil-drilling submarine for a mysterious corporation. You better meet your quota or they will cut your oxygen. Be careful, your machinery may attract the attention of something lurking below.

name: Beastly Tactics
description: A turn-based role-playing game where you embody a clever animal, facing off against others in strategic battles resolved through intuition and deception. Outsmart your opponents using the timeless tactics of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

name: Baseball Superstars 2024
description:
Baseball Superstars 2024 is a fantasy baseball game inspired by the Gamevil sports game franchise!
Develop unique players and relive the nostalgia of the original Baseball Superstars series with Baseball Superstars 2024!
Show off your incredible pitches and batting skills with the Elite Players you produce!
Train your fantastic players with the key trainers of the series!
Participate in exciting events and claim treasure trove of rewards! Jump in now and join the fun!

name: Curiosity
description:
"Curiosity killed the cat, But satisfaction brought it back."

Play as a cat as you leap and climb through a perilous labyrinth of obstacles, all to find your way back home.

name: Babelomania
description: A technogothic horror where a beautiful wedding turns into a death trap... Who will survive?

name: Football Manager 25 Mobile
description: After a record-breaking debut campaign, FM25 Mobile is returning exclusively to Netflix.

name: Football Manager 25 Touch
description: Football Manager 25 Touch is returning to Nintendo Switch for another campaign!

name: Football Manager 25 Console
description: Football Manager 25 Console is back for the new season, launching on Xbox, Xbox Game Pass and PS5 from Nov 26.

name: Football Manager 25
description: Welcome to a new era of football management. Create iconic moments in your own football universe where only you define your destiny.

name: Millumi
description: You've never thought about playing as a sheep solving mirror puzzles—until now. Millumi is a minimalist puzzle game where you are guided by a crow, directing light beams through mirrors to solve various puzzles. You'll face obstacles, mechanisms, and progressively challenging levels.

name: Stratagem Lost
description: Brave perilous turn-based strategy encounters and uncover dark conspiracies in a broken world. Draft your team of unique characters and have them learn skills from each other.

name: Dragon Front: Adventures
description: A turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you take charge of a legendary Champion and build your forces by collecting units, spells, supplies and relics. Explore unique combinations to overwhelm the opposition.

name: Twin Flames
description: Embark on a mystical journey as Savitri and Satyavan, two characters destined to become Twin Flames. In this enthralling turn-based puzzle adventure, you'll guide them through a beautifully stylized low poly world, navigating a hex grid filled with obstacles and challenges.

name: Super Alloy Crush
description: "Super Alloy Crush" is a 2D side-scrolling fighting action game. Play as Kelly and Muu (No.02) to defeat enemies and obtain treasure! Join hands with friends and take on challenges together!

name: Deep Crafter
description: As a specially trained explorer in "Deep Crafter", you'll gather resources, design production lines, automate everything, and explore this vast, ocean-covered planet to uncover its secrets.

name: Banshee: Demon Girl
description: BANSHEE is a single-player third-person soulsborne stealth action game. The first Japanese kunoichi in 16th century Europe: an incredible story of revenge from beyond the grave. Fight with a katana, move like a ninja, seduce like a geisha, and use vampiric abilities, learn from mistakes.

name: Thaw
description: Mine for ore, trace your memories, and mine again. When you reach the Snow Crystal at the lowest level, the long winter will come to the end. This gentle and quiet mining visual novel offers a small sense of accomplishment, perfect for sleepless nights.

name: Retro Drive: Revamped
description: Get your '80s vibes in full throttle with Retro Drive! Immerse yourself in the retro aesthetic, gripping narrative, and an unforgettable synthwave soundtrack.

name: Tootum
description: Awaken as Tootum, an entity trapped in an ancient temple. Embark on a journey of precise platforming and deep exploration, unlocking secrets and abilities as you discover your true identity. Each leap and each discovery brings us closer to the truth.

name: Izon
description: Chibito, who possesses the power of creation, and Kyojin, a weapon of destruction, overcome obstacles and gradually understand and depend on each other. In a decadent and beautiful world, they navigate an adventure driven by the conflicting forces of destruction and creation.

name: Smash Your PC
description:
Imagine sitting at your computer when a big error message suddenly pops up! It talks about problems and losing all your work. That's exactly what happens in the Smash Your Computer game! Have you ever felt annoyed when technology doesn't work? Well, this game takes you right into that world!

Your mission is simple: you get to destroy a computer that keeps making mistakes. It's a chance to get back at the computer for all the times it's been troublesome. It's also a safe and fun way to let out your computer-related stress without any real-world consequences.

name: Shortcut Run
description:
Race against opponents, and stack up all the floorboards you can pick up along the way!
If you're clever enough, get out of the way and build bridges and take shortcuts to get to the finish line before everyone else!

name: Nortopia
description: Help the penguins who fled from the plague and undead build a new life on the island of Nortopia! Construct a fortress, trade with other families, explore dungeons, embark on sea voyages for treasures, and engage in clan battles for power!

name: Battle Mountain
description: Battle Mountain, the pinnacle of Combat Climbing. Athletes from all over the globe gather to claim the ultimate prize: The Crowntain to grant their deepest wish. Fight across challenging maps with your friends in competitive 2-6 player chaos.

name: To Clean The Mountain
description:
To Clean The Mountain is a platforming adventure where you throw yourself towards the summit. The spirit of the mountain will talk with you as you traverse a variety of environments.

Environments
Handcrafted levels based on a variety of mountainous landscapes. Each environment features unique mechanics for you to interact with and learn, combining the interesting platforming elements with puzzle solving.

The Mountain
Elements of the world change based on how you assist the mountain. The game is completable regardless of your choices, but the difficulty is up to you.

name: Kraken Attack
description:
The Krakken has risen from the depths of the lake to wreak havoc! Help Ben send it back to where it came from!

Fire at the Krakken to wear down its energy, sending it back to the depths of the lake, before time runs out. Aim for the Krakken's chest for maximum damage. Watch out for the Krakken's fire especially the blue plasma bursts. Shoot them before they land in your path.

name: Black Dust
description: Explore a hand-drawn world of trash with your giant robot, trusty orb, and (lack of) platforming skills! These hostile lands will test your understand of many bizarre mechanics, and a complete exploration can only achieved by the most devoted of players.

name: Fight Life: Vanguard
description: Engage in strategic turn-based combat, manage and upgrade each character, and strive to reclaim harmony in a world on the brink of oblivion. Take on the mantle of leadership as you guide a mercenary squad through perilous landscapes, selecting your comrades from a diverse pool of skilled recruits.

name: Place Icebergs Apart
description: It's a puzzle game about placing iceberg tiles apart so they don't touch each other. Meet adorable polar animals and protect them from orcas!

name: Fishing Mayhem
description: Fishing Mayhem is a multiplayer game in which players catch fish and try to blow the other boats out of the water.

name: Runeomicon
description: Cast runes to summon the goddess of death, unleash eldritch horrors to fend off villagers, and wield dark magic in this unique tower defense. Balance your power between summoning and fortifying as waves of enemies close in. Can you complete the ritual before your defenses crumble?

name: Iron Crown
description: Iron Crown is a randomly generated Turn-Based deck building with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following our fellow heroes on their journey players will find random elements to help them reach their randomly generated goal, discover secrets, and claim the Iron Crown.

name: Codebreakers VR
description: Codebreakers is a chaotic VR Action Shooter that takes place in a dystopian future where various organizations are fighting for control of the world order.As a breaker, you will have to infiltrate, defeat enemies and avoid security systems to extract data.

name: Stellar Terminus
description: Stellar Terminus is a combat-focused, hard sci-fi dungeon crawler set at the heat death of the universe. Scavenge for resources, robots, and knowledge in the procedurally generated ruins of long-gone civilizations.

name: A Tiny Eternity
description: A Tiny Eternity is a cute and difficult Souls-like with Rogue elements and Twin-stick controls. Walk throw endless arenas filled with enemies to find out how come you trully never "die".

name: The Great Farce
description: The Great Farce is a non-linear mystery game that follows Claudia Marcó, journalist and former First Lady, during a series of attacks targeting the recently democratized country of Castela's politicians and their families, having to unveil the deepest secrets of their young democracy.

name: Windstorm: The Legend of Khiimori
description: Set in 13th century Mongolia, step into the role of a young courier rider. Horses will be essential to survival and safety as players breed horses, tame new ones and train them to aid them in their charting of the sprawling Mongolian landscape. As they immerse themselves into the game’s expansive open world full of wonders and intriguing tales, players will need to strategically plan their routes through different biomes of beautiful, yet harsh terrain, and master the challenges of the wilderness to complete their missions.

name: Sea Sniffers
description: Sea Sniffers is a cozy diving game in which you explore the ocean with your trusty seal companion. Encounter strange creatures and exotic treasures in sunken ships or hidden caves. Discover the deep sea and all its secrets!

name: Verde and the Echoing Water
description: A cozy-casual city building game where you will help the Dewdrop Village to solve their clean water crisis.

name: Duck Side of the Moon
description: Embark on a cozy quest as a duck in space! Take your time to make new friends and explore this strange side of the galactic pond. Mine materials to craft items and improve your spaceship in this relaxing adventure.

name: Genesis
description:
Have you ever wondered about the Mother of God?
In this loose retelling of the Gnostic Myth of Sophia, the story follows the Aeon Sophia, in their quest for love, adoration and forgiveness from the Holy Trinity. In their attempts of repentance, a chaotic call start to seed in their mind; and everything suddenly goes wrong.

name: Origens: Story Mode Remastered
description: A 3D story-based game where you play as different members of twitch streamer ORIGETV's community.

name: Space Diva
description: An interactive narrative experience about the most flamboyant beings in the universe. Join Carmen, a somewhat absent-minded middle-aged lady who has to endure bizarre situations in her space truck. And possibly mess things up like crazy.

name: The Dream Observatory
description: Become the dream weaver in The Dream Observatory. Craft the perfect oniric journey for each dreamer by using and combining dream portal cards, tailoring each experience to their needs and emotions in this immersive cozy single-player cards management game.

name: Heroes of Valor
description: Heroes of a Valor is a cartoony ww2 class based shooter with vehicles and grand scale battles.

name: Devil's Drizzle
description: An enchanting 2D pixel art platformer with an engaging story, starring a brave kid, their trusty umbrella, and Sumerian demons. It features a diverse range of mechanics and level designs, including action, adventure, horror, puzzle, and drama.

name: The Girl Who Wasn't There
description: Ranko and her friend Astrid must investigate the vanishing of a girl from their school. Learn about the secrets of St. Joachim to find her, but be cautious! A bad step may lead you towards an ugly end...

name: Decay of Opulence
description: Survive the aftermath of a divine cataclysm in this 1-bit pixel art, turn-based horror RPG. Explore a rural town overrun by rival cults.

name: Signy & Mino: Against All Gods
description: You and your pup piece together flashy combos to dismantle a plethora of enemies! Discover your hidden powers as you find yourself hurtled into a conflict amongst the gods.

name: Akaku Forest
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Chess
description: This is a chess puzzle game where you can rewind time to any previous move, but the fate of death is unchangeable. Some pieces are unaffected by time and influence all past moves simultaneously. Use these mechanics, including reality overlap, to checkmate the king in the present or the past.

name: Shuffle Quest
description: Gather your party and shuffle your spells, it’s questing time! Bring up to four friends together in a whole new dimension of roguelike deckbuilding. Four decks are better than one!

name: Aldo: Memory of the Kingdom
description: A simple, atmospheric adventure. No attack button needed—your hero fights on his own. Explore endless islands, save your village, and rebuild your kingdom.

name: You're a Dad
description: Be a responsible adult, make dinner and take care of your child. You must do this. Nothing else. Choose your path and accept the consequences in this sleep deprived text adventure where everything is totally fine.

name: Akdo
description: Sin descripción

name: This is Fine: Maximum Cope
description: Sin descripción

name: Mimic Me
description: Mimic Me is a turn-based roguelike where you control a crate mimic, rolling across a board to destroy enemy crates and collect gold.

name: Garden of Witches
description: Garden of Witches is a cute roguelike action game full of danger. Help the protagonist, Sil, as she tries to round up her unruly fellow witches and save the Garden.

name: Zombie Restaurant
description: Prepare delicious meals with ingredients that fall from the sky to feed hordes of hungry zombies before their appetite turns to us.

name: You Can't See Ghosts!
description: You Can't See Ghosts is a puzzle game where you aid ghosts in reaching the exit, but there's a twist, you can't see any of them! Use context clues like the sounds they make when bumping into walls or stepping on glass. These cues help you determine their exact position as you solve various puzzles.

name: Foxlore
description: Foxlore follows the adventure of Filo, a cunning fox who stumbles upon a mysterious map leading to an ancient relic of untold power. As Filo unravels the secrets of the relic, he uncovers hidden truths that could change the fate of his world forever.

name: Xenotech Arena
description: A Neo-Japan inspired roguelite arena shooter.

name: Harpagun
description: Harpagun is a fast-paced VR shooter where you smash alien critters, argue with your dysfunctional crew, and destroy everything in sight. Use weapons or everyday objects with a gravity ray to wreak havoc. Built for VR, it delivers chaotic fun, immersive combat, and a wild, hilarious storyline.

name: Cat-Astrophy
description: Guide Polo, a brave abducted cat, through a vast universe of exotic planets. Face challenging combats, customize your abilities, and choose your own path in this epic space odyssey to uncover Polo’s lost memories.

name: Empire Eternal
description: Immerse yourself in the ultimate real-time strategy war game where all of human history is at your command. Create powerful empires across all eras on a scale never seen before.

name: Super Hack Attack!
description: Super Hack Attack is a puzzle combat game, based on dexterity and strategy. The goal is to ban your opponent by destroying their Network using a combination of Malware, Special Programs, Defensive/Offensive Maneuvers, and Super Software to attack them.

name: Super Mario & the Elemental Orbs
description: Sin descripción

name: Satilla Composite
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Mario
description: Sin descripción

name: Moons That Belong
description: A 2D space strategy game that challenges your tactical prowess. Command your fleet, conquer planets, and outsmart your opponents.

name: Brave Meow World
description: A lightweight strategy game about controlling cat soldiers to defeat enemies and defend the base.

name: Horror Simulator: Co-Op
description: Horror Simulator VR is a horror adventure for both singleplayer and 3 player co-op. Demons lurk within the mansion, terrorizing countless victims. Form a team of exorcists, delve deep into the mansion to uncover the demon's name, capture and vanquish it.

name: Tryment
description: "TrymenT" is a visual novel that explores themes of love, friendship, and personal growth. Set in a modern-day world, players follow the lives of the protagonists as they face their own struggles and aspirations, each hoping to change their circumstances and find happiness. Through interactive choices, players can influence the story's direction, experiencing multiple endings based on their decisions. With beautifully illustrated characters and an emotional soundtrack, this game offers a touching and immersive experience for those looking to reflect on the meaning of change and connection.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción
